champ:ChampionCrown.NAME: Корона чемпиона
DESCRIPTIONS: Вы начинаете каждый бой в случайной #yСтойке.

champ:BlackKnightHelmet.NAME: Шлем чёрного рыцаря
DESCRIPTIONS: При первом переходе в #yСтойку: NL #bОборонительную даёт 2 #yЛовкости и отнимает 1 #yСилы. NL #rБерсерка, даёт 2 #yСилы и отнимает 1 #yЛовкости.

champ:Barbells.NAME: Barbell
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, if you have at least #b10 non-Upgraded cards in your deck, #yUpgrade one at random.

champ:ChampionCrownUpgraded.NAME: Victorious Crown
champ:ChampionCrownUpgraded.FLAVOR: Conglaturation!! You are the greatest winner.
DESCRIPTIONS: Заменяет #r«Корону #rчемпиона». NL Start each combat in #yUltimate #yStance, which lasts for #b2 turns.

champ:DeflectingBracers.NAME: Deflecting Bracers
champ:DeflectingBracers.FLAVOR: If you thought blocking was good then...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #yCounter equal to the amount of Block lost.

champ:DuelingGlove.NAME: Дуэльная перчатка
DESCRIPTIONS: After using a single-target Attack, if the target has no #yVulnerable, apply #b1 #yVulnerable.

champ:FightingForDummies.NAME: Сражение для чайников
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn while in no #yStance, gain #b6 #yBlock.

champ:GladiatorsBookOfMartialProwess.NAME: Gladiators Manual
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yTechnique, a #yCombo, a #yFinisher, and enter a #yStance in the same turn, gain #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity.

champ:PowerArmor.NAME: Power Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: Даёт [E] в начале вашего хода. NL Your maximum #yVigor and #yCounter is #b30.

champ:SignatureFinisher.NAME: Signature Finisher
champ:SignatureFinisher.FLAVOR: And now, it's time for my ULTIMATE MOVE!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a #yFinisher. This #yFinisher costs 0, can be used without a #yStance, and never causes your #yStance to be exited.
costs 0, can be used without a #yStance, and never causes your #yStance to be exited.

champ:SpectersHand.NAME: Spectre's Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Enter a Stance, add a #yStrike or #yDefend to your hand. It costs #b0 and has #yExhaust.

champ:LiftRelic.NAME: Inner Strength
champ:LiftRelic.FLAVOR: It's about the gigantic sword in your heart.

champ:ChampStancesModRelic.NAME: New Challenger
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat in a random Champ #yStance.
